question: Which Indian sportsperson has been named as one of the ambassadors of Badminton World Federation, for its ‘i am badminton’ campaign?
explanation:
World Champion and ace Tennis star of India P V Sindhu has been named as one of the ambassadors for Badminton World Federation (BWF)'s 'i am badminton' awareness campaign.
The campaign is aimed at highlighting the efforts of the Federation towards honesty in the game. The Badminton World Federation formed Integrity Unit five years ago. Several other shuttlers of Canada, China, England and Germany were also named along with Sindhu
